concise_definition: v. 理解, 明白, 懂得

definitions.explanation_en: To comprehend the meaning, nature, or importance of something, especially through mental processing or experience.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指通过思维活动或经验，理解某事物的含义、本质或重要性。
definitions.example_en: She understands the complexity of the issue better than anyone else in the room.
definitions.example_cn: 她比房间里任何人都更理解这个问题的复杂性。

definitions.explanation_en: To grasp the intended meaning behind words, actions, or situations, often including unspoken emotions or context.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指领会言语、行为或情境背后的意图，常包括未明言的情感或语境。
definitions.example_en: He didn't say he was upset, but I understand he's been under a lot of pressure lately.
definitions.example_cn: 他没说他不高兴，但我明白他最近压力很大。

definitions.explanation_en: To be familiar with or have knowledge of how something works, especially a system, rule, or procedure.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指熟悉或了解某事物（如系统、规则或程序）的运作方式。
definitions.example_en: Do you understand how to use this software? The instructions are not very clear.
definitions.example_cn: 你知道怎么使用这个软件吗？说明书不太清楚。

comparison.analysis: “Knows” (知道) 强调对事实、信息或技能的掌握，通常是静态的、已存储的知识。而 “understands” 更强调对意义、关系或逻辑的内在把握，是动态的认知过程。例如：你知道水的沸点是100°C，但你理解为什么加压会提高沸点。
“Comprehends” (理解) 与 “understands” 非常接近，常可互换，但 “comprehends” 更正式、更强调对复杂或抽象内容的全面把握，常用于学术或专业语境。而 “understands” 更口语化，适用范围更广。
“Grasps” (掌握/领会) 常带有“迅速抓住”或“直观领悟”的意味，强调瞬间的理解或对关键点的把握，有时暗示理解的深度或难度。而 “understands” 更中性，可涵盖从浅层到深层的多种理解层次。
